name: B. Blocks
statement:
There are n blocks arranged in a row and numbered from left to right,
starting from one. Each block is either black or white. You may perform
the following operation zero or more times: choose two blocks and invert
their colors (white block becomes black, and vice versa). You want to
find a sequence of operations, such that they make all the blocks having
the same color. You to minimize the number of operations, but it should
not exceed 3
cdot n. If it is impossible to find such a sequence of operations, you
need to report it.
